sentences.en: A holdup took place in broad daylight in a crowded street.
sentences.cn: 一起抢劫案竟在光天化日之下发生在一条热闹大街上.

sentences.en: A new method of holdup measurement for water - oil two phase flow is introduced, i . e. ultrasonic diffusion.
sentences.cn: 摘要介绍了一种油水两相流含率测量新方法? 超声散射法.

sentences.en: By a newly - established interpretation model, water saturation and water holdup can be derived from DCO.
sentences.cn: 它用新建立的解释模型计算出含水饱和度和持水率.

sentences.en: Gas holdup and liquid circulation in an internal airlift loop reactor were investigated.
sentences.cn: 研究了气升式内循环反应器内的气含率与液体循环.

sentences.en: Gas holdup increases with the increase of impeller rotating speed and aeration rate.
sentences.cn: 气含率随搅拌转速和通气速率的增大而增大.

sentences.en: He is the victim of a masked holdup.
sentences.cn: 他是一次蒙面抢劫的受害者.

sentences.en: He was involved in this holdup.
Main factors affecting on liquid holdup are pressures, pipeline diameters and gas & liquid flow rate.
sentences.cn: 影响持液率的因素主要有压力 、 管径 、气液相流量等.

sentences.en: Radiactive density - water cut meters can measure fluid density and water holdup in a well hole.
sentences.cn: 射线穿过不同物质后,物质对射线吸收的程度可用放射性密度 - 含水率计来测定.

sentences.en: The holdup for now is price.
sentences.cn: 目前首要解决的是其价格问题.

sentences.en: The phase fraction of gas - liquid two - phase flow includes void fraction and phase holdup of liquid mixture.
sentences.cn: 气液两相流的相份额包括含气率与液相中各分相的含率.

sentences.en: The water holdup is obtained based on the carbon - oxygen ratio and relation of each water holdup.
sentences.cn: 然后,根据碳氧比和各相持率的关系通过反演求取持率.

sentences.en: Then the discrete phase holdup can be measured by non - packer without changing flow state.
sentences.cn: 动态实验结果表明,该方法在油水两相条件下,可以实现分相的测量.

sentences.en: There was a holdup at the Morgan Trust Bank.
sentences.cn: 摩根信托银行发生一起抢劫案.

sentences.en: There were significant correlations between the dimensionless apparent slip velocity, apparent solids holdup and slip factor.
sentences.cn: 滑移因子、截面平均颗粒浓度与无量纲滑移速度之间存在显著相关性.

sentences.en: What could have happened? A hold-up? There'd been no gunshot or scream.
sentences.cn: 发生了什么呢？持枪抢劫？没有听到枪声或尖叫声。

trans.tran_cn: 拦劫行人的强盗行为，劫盗，无理的讨价，停顿
trans.tran_en: A holdup is a situation in which someone is threatened with a weapon in order to make them hand over money or valuables
